I have a crazy idea for a mod, but probably not enough time to make it... still, it's fun to think about, and I'm curious as to what you guys will think.

"Space Wine Industries" would add one new part, which might look something like this:

The idea is that you take wine to space to turn it into "space wine", and grow your winery's reputation!

There would be all sorts of different wines you can make: "orbit wine" (take the wine up for a spin around Kerbal), "Mun wine" (land it on the Mun) and so on, up to "grand tour wine"! To add to the challenge, the wine is a bit fragile so you have to be extra careful when you land back.

Those missions would add to your winery's reputation (different from the upcoming money/reputation system, so it doesn't interfere), and we would keep track of all the different kind of wines you've made.

Wouldn't this be fun? Perhaps if we get together, we can make the idea even more awesome and (who knows) actually build something like it!

Hey you got nuthin on ma brewskies !

haha jk i really like your idea. what about different sorts of liquor as well, each with its own difficulties and rewards? e.g. breweries, rum, etc...
